articles.author: Eric Revell
articles.title: Biden administration considering EV switch delay due to weak demand - Fox Business
articles.description: The Biden administration's EPA is reportedly planning to delay a requirement that automakers rapidly increase sales of EVs until after 2030 as weak EV sales hit American car companies.
articles.content:
The Biden administration is planning to give carmakers more time to ramp up sales of electric vehicles amid weak demand for EVs
, according to a report by the New York Times.
The administration is … [+4477 chars]
